properties.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued January 9 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
There is a potential for flooding along the following rivers and
creeks based on forecast average basin rainfall of generally
3 inches from Friday through Saturday. However...if rainfall
amounts are more or less then predicted...the potential for flooding
or magnitude will increase or decrease accordingly.  If the likelihood
of flooding becomes more certain...then a flood warning will be issued.

FLOOD POTENTIAL    POTENTIAL TIME       MAGNITUDE
LOCATION STAGE      TO FLOOD STAGE       AND CREST OF FLOODING
